code: import{ToastType}from'./types';export var CLEAR_TOASTS='CLEAR_TOASTS';export var ALERT='ALERT';export var SUCCESS='SUCCESS';export var ERROR='ERROR';export var SHOW='SHOW';export var HIDE='HIDE';export var HIDE_ALL='HIDE_ALL';export function clearToasts(){return{type:CLEAR_TOASTS};}export function show(payload){return{type:payload.type,payload:payload};}export function alert(payload){show({type:ToastType.ALERT,message:payload.message});}export function success(payload){show({type:ToastType.SUCCESS,message:payload.message});}export function error(payload){show({type:ToastType.ERROR,message:payload.message});}export function hide(id){return{type:HIDE,payload:{id:id}};}export function hideAll(){return{type:HIDE_ALL};}
